title: Altcoin of the Week: August 1 - 8
body:
Dear fans,

The council has received your suggestions and has reached a consensus. Do you have your **$CND** or **$FEVR** lock and loaded? If not, acquire them by clicking the links below.

- CryptoNerds DAO token: https://exchange.pancakeswap.finance/#/swap?outputCurrency=0x022dbE7FE889FE5353DB6d5c63D7dC2c13D38f29

- RealFevr Token: 
https://exchange.pancakeswap.finance/#/swap?outputCurrency=0x82030cdbd9e4b7c5bb0b811a61da6360d69449cc

Please vote below on the altcoins we should look into next week.

HOW QUADRATIC VOTING WORKS

You may choose as many options as you'd like. Each vote on each option increases the cost of voting quadratically (power of 2). Therefore, the more times you vote in one option, the more costly it is.

REQUIREMENTS

- Minimum of 0.000000001 CND OR 0.000000001 FEVR
- You've bought $CND prior to the proposal creation date

VOTING DATES

Start: 27/07/21 23:00 UTC
End: 31/07/21 23:00 UTC
author: 0x985A27EC406539F569362D9D5D3681D3A08b5f72
